channel.title: Economy Resetter
channel.description:
I need somebody to make a special code for me. Basicly what I need it to do is go through all of the rares in my server and delete it from everyones inventory and bank. Just please I know this is kind of asking for you to spoonfeed me but I would rather you just do that really fast then explain all this coding to me and then I have to spend hours figuring it out. I can't really offer a reward but appreciation for it. Anyway if you can make something that can do this please do, thanks in advance.
`Jake

item.title: Economy Resetter
item.dc:creator: @_Jake2 `Jake
item.description:
@_Jake2 wrote:

[quote="`Rich, post:17, topic:288505"]Example;

[code] int[] itemRemove =
{
1038, 1040, 1042,
1044, 1046, 1048
};

for (int i : p.playerItems)
{
	for (int c : itemRemove)
	{
		if (i == c)
		{
			p.items.removeItem(i, 1);
		}
	}
}
for (int i : itemRemove)
{
	if (p.playerEquipment[0] == i)
	{
		p.playerEquipment[0] = -1;
		p.playerEquipmentN[0] = 0;
	}
	for (int c = 0; c < p.bankItems.length; c++)
	{
		if (p.bankItems[c] == i)
		{
			p.bankItems[c] = 0;
			p.bankItemsN[c] = 0;
		}
	}
}[/code][/quote]

Where do I put that code at?

Read full topic

item.title: Economy Resetter
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Example;

[code] int[] itemRemove =
{
1038, 1040, 1042,
1044, 1046, 1048
};

for (int i : p.playerItems)
{
	for (int c : itemRemove)
	{
		if (i == c)
		{
			p.items.removeItem(i, 1);
		}
	}
}
for (int i : itemRemove)
{
	if (p.playerEquipment[0] == i)
	{
		p.playerEquipment[0] = -1;
		p.playerEquipmentN[0] = 0;
	}
	for (int c = 0; c < p.bankItems.length; c++)
	{
		if (p.bankItems[c] == i)
		{
			p.bankItems[c] = 0;
			p.bankItemsN[c] = 0;
		}
	}
}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Economy Resetter
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

I have 9000 accounts, and I said make a loop. It does it for you. Heres an example:

for (int c = 0; c < playeritems.length; c++) {
if (playeritems[c] == a_rare_id) {
playeritems[c] == 0;
}
}
a rare id is the id of a rare
player items is the list of items for a player.

Just have a loop like that when a person logs in, and it will delete rares. (its not perfected of cource… written in 30sec…)

Read full topic
